Nerangs.ab: gauue aδāiš ēk tāg frāgām az pas ī barsom datuš az dast ī hōy ul widārišn tāiš š́iiaōθnāiš ān ī dudīgar az pas ī barsom datuš az dast ī dašn ul widārišn yāiš vahištāiš fraēš́iiāmahī at̰ ax́iiāi aṣ̌ā mazdā̊ bun ī barsom ō ī urwēs nihišn uruuarā̊ sar ī barsom ō ī urwēs nihišn ud dudīgar bār bun ī barsom ō ī urwēs nihišn

"At gauue aδāiš, he has to put one frāgām (into the barsom) from the back part of the barsom and the datuš from the left side (of the barsom). At tāiš š́iiaōθanāiš, he has to put the second frāgām (into the barsom) from the back part of the barsom and the datuš from the right side (of the barsom). At yāiš vahištāiš fraēš́iiāmahī at̰ ax́iiāi aṣ̌ā mazdā̊, he has to touch the urwēs with the beginning of the barsom. At uruuarā̊ vaxšat̰, he has to touch the urwēs with the end of the barsom and has to touch a second time the urwēs with the beginning of the barsom."

gauue datuš barsom bun tā sar šustan aδāiš. ēk tāg frāgām az pas ī barsom datuš az dast ī hōy ul widārišn tāiš š́iiaōθnāiš ān ī dudīgar az pas ī barsom datuš az dast ī dašn ul widārišn yāiš vahištāiš fraēš́iiāmahī at̰ ax́iiāi aṣ̌ā mazdā̊ bun ī barsom ō ī urwēs nihišn uruuarā̊ sar ī barsom ō ī urwēs nihišn ud dudīgar bār bun ī barsom ō ī urwēs nihišn

"At gauue, he has to wash the barsom from the beginning to the end. At aδāiš, he has to put one frāgām (into the barsom) from the back part of the barsom and the datuš from the left side (of the barsom). At tāiš, he has to put the second frāgām (into the barsom) from the back part of the barsom and the datuš from the right side (of the barsom). At š́iiaōθnāiš yāiš vahištāiš fraēš́iiāmahī at̰ ax́iiāi aṣ̌ā mazdā̊, he has to touch the urwēs with the beginning of the barsom. At uruuarā̊ vaxšat̰, he has to touch the urwēs with the end of the barsom and has to touch a second time the urwēs with the beginning of the barsom."
